name: Crystal of Atlan
storyline:
Atlan, a floating world where magic and technology coexist. After the second Magitek Revolution, magic became an important source of power that could be put in all places. Fuel for airships, bullets for weapons, and in the hands of the powerful.
And as a mysterious source of boundless magical energy, the Crystal of Atlan, makes its entrance, the city of adventurers becomes shrouded in conspiracy.
The dangerous and deceitful magitek city, the creeping Decay, and beings from out of this world. Now, it's your time, Adventurer. Enter the stage as you face countless challenges to purify the world and write your own epic as the world's greatest adventurer!
summary: Crystal of Atlan is a Magipunk Action MMORPG! As a member of the Adventurer's Guild, you'll be missioned to explore the world of Atlan and gradually unveil the mysteries around the Crystals of Atlan, the source of all energy in the world!
